doc.field: SOUTHERN AIR SUES MIAMI TV STATION

Southern Air Transport> said it sued WPLG-Channel 10 of Miami for compensatory and punitive damages in excess of 50 mln dlrs for false and defamatory statements made by the television station in a series of broadcasts last month. The complaint alleges that the broadcast contained numerous false statements which the stations knew were untrue. Officials of either company were unavailable for comment. Reuter
